title: Wow
text: CapCut is one of the best editing resources I have ever used!! This app lets you create any type of video or edits that you desire! I know when I started CapCut it was hard to find the right tools or effects for my videos but now this app is my go to for editing all types of videos. This might seem like a scam at first but trust me I have downloaded almost all of the editing apps on Apple and I guarantee that CapCut is the best one for you! If you have younger kids though I would recommend kinmaster but anyone above 8 should definitely download the app! Another cool feature is that for beginners there is an option where you can look at templates or what others have created and get inspiration from that too!!!!!!!!! 😜🤪😃😄😁😆😏

title: Idk just read this
text: The editing styles and effects in this app is very useful and amazing to edit your videos or photos with I like that you can post templates for others to use and for you to get view and likes subs but there’s a few things bothering me about this app also trying not to make this to long but I saw some effects that aren’t that good but can still be pretty useful and stuff idkkk but those effects got changed to premium and I’m just wondering why like we bearly have any shakes and flashes but now it’s worse because it became premium so I’m kinda upset about that because literally almost all the effects are premium plz CapCut creators if your reading this please add new effects that aren’t premium by the way no offense or anything like that I’m just saying like it’s kinda annoying but I like the app tho

title: Grown a channel of 300+ from using CapCut
text:
I started my channel, not knowing how to edit and then I found a CapCut I’ve been using CapCut ever since it’s so like easy to use but it also makes my edits look, professional. I went from not even knowing how to change the format to now I almost know how to do everything. Also, I’ve never had a problem with it lagging while editing. Also, I love how they made a PC version which is really nice. Moral of the story. If you’re looking for a easy to learn editor coming for me as a small YouTuber, who started with CapCut I just have to say CapCut is your option. One thing that kills me is that people say CapCut is for beginners. Its not, people with many thousands of subscribers use CapCut. You have you know what your doing. 

Also a little thing for CapCut!
 
If y’all made a pro version, like don’t lock any existing things, add new ones and charge not to much like 3-5$ a month maybe. I think a lot of people would buy it. Including me! But keep it mainly free and like if you want… we have pro. But don’t go fully like paid, because I think the reason CapCut is so popular because it’s free.

The_tire_ant  (YT)

title: This app is EVERYTHING
text: Literally I love this app sm, like it’s amazing and 100% free, like you have access to everything! Literally it’s so hard to find an app that has good editing graphs that is free but this app is so good for being free, like I edit everything with this! I do have a question though! I was wondering if maybe you could add a folder setting, basically where you can take ur edits and store them in a folder on the app, so then if u have multiple edits that have to do with the same thing, you could put it in that category/ folder, that way if you wanna look at certain edits you would be able to go into that folder and look at the edit/vid! Just an idea ofc! Anyways I love this app sm! And I 100% recommend it!!💕💕

title: Great!! ...but one minor problem TwT
text: This app is great! I’ve had it for about a year now and it’s really fun to use especially when you make projects with the app! But there a tiny problem with the app that bugs me a little. The reason why I’m saying that is because whenever I add a black screen or something that is dark these random blue blurry dots appear for some reason and the app never did that before, and what’s even weirder is that it doesn’t show it on the CapCut app when I’m working on the video, it shows it when I upload a video. it happened around August I believe..for me at least. But overall, this app is great but I really want that minor problem to be fixed if that’s okay! :,)❤️

title: My review ~

title: Few things to improve!
text: First I DO NOT want to start as negative stuff. The app is great for making apology videos to holiday videos! You have great sounds, stickers, and do not get me wrong….. THE FONT AND COLORS =  aMaZiNg!! Okay so I would ask for you to make the tutorial videos a bit more clear I only got 63% of helpfulness out of about 5 but I watched some then I got 75% of knowledge to make videos! Also, could you not have notifications like every day? It drives me insane, like today there was “there is 81K likes on a new template! Come try it out!” The notifications are VERY, VERY annoying! Also sometimes the stickers are a BITTTTTT edgy. The edgy stickers give me the heeby jeebies. To sum this up, please make the stickers less edgy and less notifications and make tutorial videos better.

title: Capcut is Awsome! I also have suggestions,
text:
If you are new to editing this would be a perfect editing app to start with or stay with. I have just stuck with CapCut but I am thinking of using other apps after I check out there reviews.

I like CapCut I have been using it for a long time to make my edits. There are a couple glitches but they don’t effect ur edit. Also they should update the filters, some of them are kinda just well um crazy…

title: CapCut is amazing!
text:
I have been using CapCut for around a year, and with that I have been able to create high quality content to share with my friends! I have been able to make my own series where I act, and just have fun! My family and friends love it! It is insane how much you can do with this app! Why buy an expensive app on your computer, when you can just buy this! It’s not like you’re  making a movie! However I do dislike the new Pro features. There used to not be Pro features. So some features I believe I used to use have been locked. I do understand however, because it is already a free app! I have a few other slight concerns which I’m not going to mention. 

CapCut is great and I highly recommend it over some $200 PC editing app.

title: Amazing but…
text: Ok, so this app is really amazing cause it has a lot of editing options but I hate how it takes up so much storage and how if I flip my camera around I can’t flip it back around. So first off, whenever I have enough storage to get the app, I make videos and then I have no storage left and it’s upsetting. So if the developer of this app could change how much storage this takes up that would be great. Also, when I try to record my videos, I flip my camera, but when I try to flip it back around it won’t work. So again, if the developer could change this so you can flip your camera around and back without any trouble that would be great. I’m sorry if this sounds picky but I want to say other than those 2 things this app is amazing!

title: I love it!!
text: I really love capcut!! before I started posting I was lonely and needed friends who understood me and while im currently posting right now I found a community that is just like me!! Im sad because I only get 2 more days to post then I have to reapply but if capcut lets me I can post for as long as I can!! The only reason I put four stars is that people put rude comments on other peoples posts and I had to delete the comments but if you would check the comment first and see "is this a kind/good comment?" and if its not dont let them say it. Capcut should be a safe place for kids and adults that like to post!! In all thats the reason I put four stars, if this didnt happen then it would be a full five stars!! <3

title: CapCut, really man?…
text: I love CapCut and it’s pretty much simple to use and it’s free, well I thought it was free… CapCut why in the world would you add “pro” nobody wants to pay for a app that lets you edit videos the old you was so much better I can’t even edit right anymore because of this some thing called “pro” that makes you pay for simple things you could do yourself but I thought I could take it the easy way since they added it but NO! They make me pay for it instead, I sound a lot like a Karen rn but dude please get rid of CapCut pro I enjoy the new stuff but man I don’t wanna pay for anything I thought this was a no payment app… it used to be one but now they added all this unnecessary features like CapCut pro itself. That’s my only problem thank you CapCut.

title: Great app but just a few suggestions
text: CapCut is a great app no matter what video your making or editing. There’s many places to look for inspiration and it’s great that it’s linked to TikTok, but there a few suggestions that I have. First, it would be nice if you didn’t have to have an account to follow people and comment on their templates. Next, it would be nice if we could connect splits. (I’m sorry if this is already a thing and I haven’t figured it out) Lastly, it would be nice if you could use google or an email to make an account. Over all this is a great app and if you need to edit a video this is the app for you. I’d totally recommend it to anyone, and It’d be nice if these suggestions could be added in.

title: Amazing app… but….
text: Amazing app But they just made the app have payment walls. Look I get the app needs money shore. But I would pay a one time payment of 20$ for this app any day, It’s great. But monthly payments…. Nope. I love that they kept the other features. But I might go back to using Final Cut Pro cause I can’t support pay walls. Not in apps not in video games. To me pay walls are lazy and anti consumer. I’m not mad at cap cut… but I really can’t support it.  But man when it was free it was amazing… and it technically is still free… but the good stuff is behind monthly payments. That’s why I don’t have adobe anymore. I payed for it then they wanted more money for things. I hope people wake up and see that this is worse and not good for the market… great app loved cap cut till they created a monthly pay wall. Instead of a one time payment.  For basic transitions and features. That are free on the internet for higher end software.

title: Great editing app however
text: I love this app, it’s amazing for editing and is great for beginners and pros as well. But, when I ran out of storage, I decided to delete projects that I did not care about and some I wasn’t working on, but I accidentally clicked on a project I’ve been working on for days, and I tried to not select it, but when I thought it wasn’t selected, it got deleted. So I tried to find out how you could recover a recently deleted draft, and you can’t recover it. So I wasted a few days on nothing. Overall, this app is great for editing, but I was literally being stupid and accidentally clicked on a project I loved and have been working on for days, and deleted it. This app has lots of great effects, templates and all. I would give it 5 stars, however I downgraded it bc I accidentally deleted a project I didn’t want to delete.

title: My first review ever
text:
This is quite literally my first review ever for an app and that’s because this editing program delivers so much value. I’m a media producer and manager for a financial company so I’m always looking for tools to increase efficiency and quality of our videos. CapCut is hands down the best free editing app you can get. I would go so far to say is better than many of the paid apps on here.

For any social media creators out there this app is a must. It delivers high quality auto captions with endless tools that can turn any short video into professional content.

There’s people paying editors $1000 + a week for what this app could for free. Do yourself a favor, download this app and learn it back to front.

title: This is the best app ever but…
text: I love this app but there’s a few things that I don’t know how to do on here I don’t know how to crop out a character or make it look like I am holding a character but it is a very good app I had this for half of a year I believe it’s done fairly well for me I make Roblox videos on it and I also. Make A kuromi a video once. In that turned out super cute! I recommend this to people who don’t know how to edit fairly well. It is very easy because it also kind of teaches you from the start🥰😁😄. Which is nice of the app so I recommend this to anybody if you start it it will teach you. If you decide to get this app have fun learning how to learn how it works will you have fun when you have the app.😄😁

title: Two Small Things….But Overall Amazing!
text:
I am literally in love with this app. I made so many edits and videos by using this. There are so many things you can do in this app! So many different combinations you can choose from and make your videos unique. Although, I have 2 small requests that would make this better

1. I love making AMVs but when I insert GIFs, it just becomes a photo from a random scene in a GIF. I would really appreciate if you would let GIFs actually be GIFs instead of just photos

2. It would be cool if you could change the pitch without changing the speed. I also like making cosplay videos with music in the background and I like to make it look like the character is singing it. But, there are only so many versions of a song you can find on the internet. If you don’t get what I mean, take the song Control for example. All the male covers of the song is high and the character I’m relating to has a deep voice. I made the video slower, but I can’t make it too slow or it would look weird. I hope that makes sense.

Other than that, I would defiantly recommend this app, 10/10!

title: Just a BIG problem
text: Realistically this app deserves five stars but there’s one problem I keep having with this app I don’t know of other people have been having this problem too or if I’m just going crazy but for some reason every once in a while when I upload a video from my camera roll through CapCut all of the audio my voice goes away the games audio stays it’s just my voice that goes but when I check my video in my actual camera roll my microphone was on and you can hear me speaking up for some reason the CapCut just completely gets rid of my voice which is kind of annoying because I’m YouTuber and this is the editing software I used to make my videos and until this gets fixed CapCut is gonna stay at a 4 star from me

title: I love it but….
text: I’ve always used CapCut because I’m not good at anything else, i was so happy it was free, but what is up with all the “CapCut pro”?? Ain’t free no more. And, AND it takes up so much space. I have to redownload the app every time because it takes up so much space after a few days. It goes from 3MB to 11GB in a week. I don’t recommend it but it’s good for beginners! Still upset you made it so everything is CapCut pro. What I do recommend is just making it with pro and then record the video, cut it, make another video, add the one you just took to it, crop it n stuff and then voila! Atleast make tokens so people can save up tokens to use certain pro accesses by using it, posting stuff, or doing daily tasks or just logging in, I hope you fix the space problem and make it so downloads aren’t so large.

title: Good, but…
text: I absolutely love CapCut. But, there are some things that are missing. It’s a great way to get my base video with all the cuts, reverses, velocities, and things like that, that I need for a good FNAF edit.  But I wish it had better effects (ex. better rainbow discoloration effect) so I wouldn’t have to use three different editing apps. Another thing, I used the effect ‘Smart Sharpen’ on all of my edits. Just now, I came on and saw Smart Sharpen is now a Pro effect. My edits now lack the finishing touch they once had, because I am not willing to pay for a whole membership, for one effect. It would be much appreciated if Smart Sharpen was returned to being a normal effect, since I have so much relied on it for my edits. Other than that, not bad, just wish the effects were a bit more advanced, and Smart Sharpen is no longer a Pro effect!

title: The Social Media Video Editor to Rule Them All
text: As a professional video editor doing a lot of social media posts, I really appreciate how easy my workflow is with CapCut. They really did a great job including all the features you need for social media with an intuitive, user friendly app. I love that there is a desktop version so I can switch between my computer and phone. I still use some indestry standard editors for a few things here and there, but 9 times out of 10, CapCut can get the job done faster and it is more fun to use. For anyone not doing million dollar bluckbuster movies (and like who watches  those these days anyway) CapCut is the only app you will ever need. 10/10! 5-Stars!

title: Great
text: I gave us a five star because I love all of the cool pieces you can make, and how they’re so much related to life and the POV‘s and other stuff. but one thing I also could add is that you should have more rareness on the inappropriate templates. If the template is in bikinis and showing things that kids that are on here shouldn’t see they should be banned from their account for two months if there’s anything like shaking the bottom is I would say OK.  Another thing is that you should make it to where you don’t have to sign in to be able to make great pieces and pay money. Other than that this is a great app. Just make it a little more PG for kids that also like to make these cool templates and videos.

title: ‼️‼️ It’s cool but missing important features ‼️‼️
text:
Imagine you’ve just finished editing a very long video and you’re ready to export it. You’re exporting it, 1 minute later the video is at 1 percent and you are incapable of using your device until it finishes. You even have to make sure your phone doesn’t turn off the whole time. Background exporting is a necessity. 

Dark mode would also be a great feature for this app. It gets irritating to the eyes when most of your other apps are already in dark mode, then you open this app and get flashed by the blinding white light. The main screen needs to be adjusted where we are able to use the Dark Mode feature. It is completely white as opposed to the video editor. Please fix.

title: What I think
text: I feel like if you’re going to make an app like this and put in videos and being able to post just like TikTok you should be able to login with your Google account you shouldn’t have to be able to login through Apple tick-tock or Facebook because people are not everyone’s gonna have TikTok or Facebook because I know some of my friends that use CapCut they really want to be able to post on here but their parents won’t let them have TikTok or Facebook like not everybody has those so I feel like if you’re gonna make something like this you should be able to login just with your Google account that way it’s for everybody anyone can login and have an account.

title: The best editing app for short form content on the go!
text: CapCut is hands down the best editing app for short form content on the go. I was impressed with how easy and intuitive the app is to use. With CapCut, I was able to quickly put together high-quality videos that look stunning. The range of features and tools available in the app is impressive, and I was able to make use of its filters, music, and effects to make my videos look and feel more professional. I highly recommend this app to anyone who wants to create amazing videos without having to spend hours in front of a computer. Overall, CapCut is a must-have tool for anyone who wants to make their content stand out.

title: Honestly
text: wow. this app is so fun. i love it. i honestly really love it. but. of course. there are the problems. this app is just so glitchy and i always find myself closing out of it and relaunching it. right now, i really want to use my favorite filter on photo effects, but i cant. its working on other projects but not the ones im making now. none of the photo effects are coming up. all the other effects are coming up. the body effects are, the video effects. but not the photo effects. i literally even updated it. but it still doesn't work. i closed out and relaunched it multiple times. please fix this and i will give this five stars because i really really love this app its one of my favorite of all time apps. but these bugs really make me mad.

title: Amazing! But a few suggestions!
text: CapCut is the best editing app l have ever used l like how everything is free! I been using this app for about 2 years! But l do think it could use some changes! So yea these are my suggestions you could maybe add in CapCut? : if there was a 3D button? My edits need these! It would make the app 10X better! And maybe add like more animations! title: Could use features for long text.
text: Everything is great except that working with the ai writer beta is the only way to paste long passages of text to be chopped up into text. After that, it’s great to have the text to speech read it all. I really wish I didn’t have to edit and paste into the ai writer to have this feature. Also, everything pastes fine, but when it’s converted to subtitles, the text loses all quotation marks and apostrophes, requiring that you have to comb through the text and edit it manually for punctuation. This all seems like it could be better and I hope the devs are paying attention to the comments for improving their app. It really is a good video editor app.

title: it’s ok
text:
i’ve had capcut for a few months now and i’ve noticed a few things that are wrong with the app. first, there’s no graphs. it’s all premade transitions. The keyframes are almost useless. Nothing is smooth. If you do use keyframes, it looks horrible. Second, you have no coloring section. And they’re all premade. So I can’t make my own coloring.
And finally, your speed settings. The slomotion is SO laggy, it makes me want to ball my eyes out. And your app is really only used for velocity’s, and there is t even a smooth slomo. I loved capcut because I wanted to become an editor, but I didn’t have the money to pay so much money every few months. And it all made sense, but it was so different from any other editing app. There isn’t even motion blur (tracking). So, if there’s any way you can fix these problems, it would be a great app.

title: Insane editor, one problem.
text:
This thing is a literal powerhouse. This editor has many customizable text styles, many stickers, multiple layers, all that jazz. The one thing that makes CapCut stand out from the rest is that it’s 100% FREE! No in-app purchases, no monthly subscriptions, no ads, no watermarks, no NOTHING. Seriously, what else can you ask for?

However, when I export certain stickers, the app just crashes, and the video doesn’t save to my camera roll. I tried multiple times, same thing, over and over again. Nope, just crashes. I really hope this gets fixed soon.

Overall, I would recommend this app for mobile content creators. If you are looking for a mobile editing app, you’ve came to the right place.

title: Why I hate and love it
text:
Why I love it: why i love it is cuz you can edit and all types of stuff it helped me editing I know how to screen record and it is awesome you have to update it to make the pic move which is not a problem! I can also share which makes me happy cuz I can show edits to my cousins me and my cousin edit with each other we love to see what we make

title: BEST APP EVERRR
text: It’s such a good app it rlly easy to edit and fun to make videos and stuff 100% recommend if you like making videos or just saving ya you also don’t haft to pay the videos that you make so if you don’t want to post smt that you made you don’t haft to post it you can just save it and it not like you haft to do a million things to post or save the videos that you make but on CapCut you can also just watch videos if you want you don’t rlly haft to make videos if you don’t want to and you also can watch your own videos (I know that you can do that like everywhere just saying cuz some apps do allow you to watch your own vis for some reason idk why cuz like it’s you own vids)

title: REALLY GOOD!!!! One thing maybe to fix
text: CapCut is a great app I’ve been using it for a while but one thing I would fix is how when you first get the app you can look at templates FROM the app but after a few days or you sign in you can’t look at templates from there unless you go to your history, so if you could just make so that we are able to see templates from the app at all time. Also, because some people- such as me- don’t have TikTok so we can’t access templates from there. So that’s my one recommendation, to make it so we’re able to get templates from the app at all times! But overall I love this app and I use it everyday!!! I would really recommend getting this app!!!

title: CAPCUT PLEASE FIX THIS BUG!!
text:
I have been using Capcut for about 3 years, and honestly it’s an amazing app. The  is though, I have been getting this bug for about a month and it’s not fun. It says I can’t connect to the internet and I’m connected to the internet. It wont let me choose music for any of my edits I’m trying to make, and it’s really hard because I’ve tried multiple times and it still wont work. I would recommend this app if this bug was fixed!! The problem is I am in a editing class and this is gonna help if I can use it, and I can’t. I’ve been trying for so long to edit and it just won’t work. I can’t even see templates for inspo etc. It’s honestly getting a little annoying, so please Capcut, fix

                       WOULD RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!!!

title: Buggy and unusable if you don’t grant access to all photos
text:
Although it’s typical for apps to try to push you to grant access to all photos instead of just selected photos, so they can greedily gobble more of your data, this app takes that manipulation to a new level. There is only one opportunity given to select photos. not once per project, I mean once per app installation. After that, literally anytime you use the app you can only use the ones you previously selected. So if you start a new project with new photos, you actually have to delete and reinstall the app losing all of your previous data. Don’t pretend you’re giving us an option. If it’s not really an option. It just makes me not trust this app.

Also, other people have mentioned the bug where if you try to click on a small segment, it thinks you’re trying to add an overlay.

And it’s laggy and fails at exporting a few times before working.

title: Awesome app, but…
text: So, I decided to write this review for a few reasons. One, I’ve been getting the “No internet connection.” for like 4 days now? I have VPN and everything! Everything else is working perfectly fine! If it’s a bug, or anything..please fix it! Two, It’s easy to understand, but maybe for newer editors, give them a tutorial? I’m not sure if you guys already have one, but…that would be helpful! Just a recommendation! Well, I guess that’s it. Overall, this is a wonderful app! I use it so much! Keep up the updates and awesome work! I’ve used it to edit so many videos and the results come out great!!! Again, please try fixing this weird bug, or whatever it is…I’m not sure if it’s just me, though. Haha. Anyways, thank you for reading, developers! 😃
